subject: Re: FW: Cozze Website Update 2023
preview: Hi Rosemary, Happy Monday. Confirming the Cozze Pizza updates are now live. Here is your pre-update backup file: https://www.dropbox.com/s/nakil80ojwz6ydd/dsd-cozzepizza-live-prod-dlbackup-03122322

full_threads.body:
Hi Rosemary, 

Happy Monday. 

Confirming the Cozze Pizza updates are now live. 

Here is your pre-update backup file: https://www.dropbox.com/s/nakil80ojwz6ydd/dsd-cozzepizza-live-prod-dlbackup-031223225103.zip?dl=

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Chris Paradowski

full_threads.body:
Hi @heath.

We have green light for push to live on: https://stg-cozzepizza-staging.kinsta.cloud/

Rosemary has requested a "pre-update" backup of https://cozze.com.au/ before push is complete.

NB: non-support users have been removed and the site is set to index on Google (non-index unticked)

Hi Rosemary, 

You are most welcome, you mentioned you were busy so I thought it was worth a quick note. 

I will get the push queued with our dev team and report back once complete + a backup file.

Hi Chris,

Thanks for the reminder, good to go live!!

Can you send us a copy of the backup of the site before replacing it, just in case we want to go back and use something from it in future.

Thanks,

Rosemary

Hi Rosemary, 

A qiuck note to touch base on the update for the Cozze website. 

We are standing by to push the changes from staging to live domain, please let us know when you'd like that to happen.

Hi Rosemary, 

Confirming the retailer logos have been updated.

i have updated the logos using the new files.

Great news, we have completed the most recent updates, here is an video run-through: https://www.loom.com/share/af363f3de0ca4faf936e20bc771aaf8a?sid=0a15b0d7-b677-4485-8bbf-d373f9bcde87

please check the updates. chris.

full_threads.body:
Hi Rosemary, 

No sweat and thanks for the lighting fast reply! I'm disappointed I wasn't able to solve the riddle via the EU site.

Speak soon,

Hi Chris,

Sorry, 17" is CZ90555

Thanks,

Rosemary

Hi Rosemary, 

Thanks for the quick reply. I was referring the Excel. CZ90551 is doubled up across 2 items. Can you please confirm the SKUs for the both items?

Hi Chris,

The codes on the excel file are correct. I noted something similar when I was going through their website. But the ovens look the same, but mainly our gas regulations are different, hence different numbers. Please use the imagery and detail supplied, as relevant for our market.



Thanks,

Rosemary

We are making our way through the updates. 

A quick question regarding the SKUs.

Item: Cozze Pizza Oven Gas appears to have a an incorrect SKU, according to the EU site it should be CZ90354. Is this correct?

Hi Chris,



I accepted the quote this morning for Cozze.



Have saved assets here:

https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/puoxtm4wwl1egk7xlcl2s/h?rlkey=xr374lpglsvlogeci0xm7ivjg&dl=0
